prompts.frontCover:
A humorous and lighthearted birthday card for Sammy, featuring a watercolor illustration of the two people from the reference photo ec930362-d5fc-4ab5-a657-932dec5252e7. The two are transformed into funny, slightly exaggerated cartoon characters, but they HIGHLY resemble the people in the photo, preserving their exact individual characteristics, clothing (without any text/logos), hairstyles, facial features, and body proportions. They are standing in their same relative positions, hilariously struggling to hold up a giant, oversized, ridiculously wobbly birthday cake that's tilting precariously. The cake has frosting dripping down the sides and a single, comically bent candle on top. The background is a clean, simple wash of soft, festive colors. In the center, written in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script, is the text: "Happy Birthday Sammy! Hope it's a piece of cake!" The entire image is in a flat 2D watercolor painting style with soft flowing colors, visible artistic brush strokes, a subtle paper texture, and organic paint bleeds at the edges.

- Reference photos provided for character creation
- Characters should only appear on the front cover
- Transform real people into artistic cartoon/illustrated versions matching the style
- Maintain recognizable features while adapting to the artistic style
